This presentation was an introductory workshop on [OpenSesame](https://osdoc.cogsci.nl/) designed for researchers in Cognitive Psychology and Education. OpenSesame is open-source software created to design experiments and research tasks.

During the workshop, we explored:

- The interface and basic features of OpenSesame.
- How to configure the structure of an experimental task.
- Stimulus presentation to participants.
- Response collection and data recording.

You can find the slides [here](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1V1NwuSTrRHvsHDRw6v-KXhNtubbNmmQyWa_e_SIJy8Y/edit?usp=sharing).
